resources.string:
Use BookWorm to keep track of books you have read, and you intend to read. Maintain a log of books that you can quickly view, sort, and rate.

In the future this application will also be able to synchronize (import/export) with online book sources such as Google Books, OpenLibrary, and others; and will include more features such as book reviews (in the works).\n

For more information, and to comment or report issues, please visit the BookWorm project site.
You don't have any books in your list yet. Use the Menu Add feature to add books.
